00063         const TDesC& sender, CRichText& body) = 0;

00065         TUid aMtmUid, CBaseMtm* aMtm);
00066

00068   virtual void handle_close() = 0;

00070             const TDesC& sender, CRichText& body) = 0;

00072             TUid aMtmUid, CBaseMtm* aMtm);
00073 };
